description: Detects suspicious PowerShell scripts accessing SAM hives Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: PowerShell scripts fixing HiveNightmare / SeriousSAM ACLs
name: PowerShell SAM Copy
query: (process.command_line:*\\HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy* AND process.command_line:*ystem32\\config\\sam* AND process.command_line:(*Copy\-Item* OR *cp\ $_.* OR *cpi\ $_.* OR *copy\ $_.* OR *.File\]\:\:Copy\(*))
